purpose.summary: COACTVWC is a CICS online transaction (CAVW) that displays a screen prompting for an 11-digit account ID, receives and validates the input for numeric non-zero value, sequentially reads VSAM files CXACAIX (card xref by acct path) to get cust ID/card num, ACCTDAT (account master) for status/balances/dates, and CUSTDAT (customer master) for name/address/phone/SSN/FICO, then populates and redisplays the screen with retrieved data or error messages. On PF3, it XCTLs back to caller or main menu (COMEN01C). Errors like NOTFND or invalid input trigger reprompt with specific messages.
purpose.business_context: Part of CardDemo application for viewing linked account/customer details via card cross-reference, supporting account inquiry in banking/card services.

inputs.name: CACTVWAI
inputs.description: Screen input map received via CICS RECEIVE MAP, key field ACCTSIDI (account ID filter, edited to CC-ACCT-ID replacing * or spaces with LOW-VALUES)

inputs.name: DFHCOMMAREA
inputs.description: Incoming commarea parsed into CARDDEMO-COMMAREA (COCOM01Y: context like CDEMO-FROM-PROGRAM/TRANID) and WS-THIS-PROGCOMMAREA (CA-CALL-CONTEXT), used to persist CDEMO-ACCT-ID/CUST-ID/CARD-NUM across reenters

inputs.name: CXACAIX
inputs.description: Card-account cross-reference VSAM file, read by alternate path ACCT-ID (WS-CARD-RID-ACCT-ID-X) to retrieve XREF-CUST-ID and XREF-CARD-NUM

inputs.name: ACCTDAT
inputs.description: Account master VSAM file, read by ACCT-ID (WS-CARD-RID-ACCT-ID-X) to retrieve fields like ACCT-ACTIVE-STATUS, ACCT-CURR-BAL, ACCT-CREDIT-LIMIT, dates

inputs.name: CUSTDAT
inputs.description: Customer master VSAM file, read by CUST-ID from xref (WS-CARD-RID-CUST-ID-X) to retrieve CUST-ID, SSN (formatted), FICO, DOB, names, address, phone, govt ID, EFT acct

outputs.name: CACTVWAO
outputs.description: Output screen map sent via CICS SEND MAP (CCARD-NEXT-MAP=CACTVWA), populated with titles/dates/transaction/program (lines 436-453), input account ID (468), account details if found (471-491), customer details if found (494-523), error msg (532), info msg/prompt (533, 527), with attributes/color/cursor positioning (541-572)

outputs.name: WS-COMMAREA
outputs.description: Outgoing commarea combining updated CARDDEMO-COMMAREA (with new CDEMO-ACCT-ID/CUST-ID/CARD-NUM, context like CDEMO-TO-PROGRAM/TRANID/LAST-MAPSET) and WS-THIS-PROGCOMMAREA, returned via CICS RETURN TRANSID(CAVW)

called_programs.purpose: On PF3=ENTER, XCTL to original caller (CDEMO-FROM-PROGRAM) or default menu COMEN01C, passing updated CARDDEMO-COMMAREA with context/last map

business_rules.description: Account ID input must be exactly 11 numeric digits, non-zero; trim leading * or spaces to LOW-VALUES
business_rules.logic_summary: If blank/* set BLANK flag and prompt; else test NUMERIC and <> ZEROES, else error msg and reprompt

business_rules.description: Read chain fails if NOTFND in CXACAIX or ACCTDAT or CUSTDAT: set error flags, build specific msg with RESP/RESP2 and key, reprompt without data display
business_rules.logic_summary: On DFHRESP(NOTFND) set INPUT-ERROR/FLG-NOT-OK, string msg with key/resp/reason into WS-RETURN-MSG if not already set

business_rules.description: Only valid AIDs: ENTER or PF3; invalid PFK forces ENTER (reprompt)
business_rules.logic_summary: Set PFK-VALID only for ENTER/PF3, else force ENTER

business_rules.description: First entry (EIBCALEN=0) or menu call (CDEMO-FROM-PROGRAM=COMEN01C and not REENTER) initializes commarea and prompts

transforms.transformation_description: If * or SPACES, set to LOW-VALUES; else direct move
Format as XXX-XX-XXXX using STRING CUST-SSN(1:3)- (4:2)- (6:4)

copybooks_used.purpose: Card demo work area: CCARD-AID, CC-WORK-AREA, CCARD-ERROR-MSG, CCARD-NEXT-* fields
CARDDEMO-COMMAREA: CDEMO-* fields for acct/cust/card IDs, from/to program/tranid, usrtag, pgm-enter/reenter, last-mapset/map
BMS symbolic map constants: DFHBMFSE, DFHRED, DFHDFCOL etc. for attributes/color
BMS map: CACTVWA I/O fields like ACCTSID*, ACSTTUS*, error/info msg
Abend data: ABEND-MSG, ABEND-CULPRIT, ABEND-CODE, ABEND-DATA
Additional account layout (unused in visible code)

paragraphs.purpose: Entry point: HANDLE ABEND, initialize areas/commarea, store PFKEY via COPY CSSTRPFY, validate/set AID, EVALUATE on AID/context to XCTL(PF3), send map(new), process inputs+read data(reenter), or plain text error
Set error msg on map, build outgoing WS-COMMAREA from CARDDEMO-COMMAREA + WS-THIS-PROGCOMMAREA, CICS RETURN TRANSID CAVW
Chain to init vars/attrs/send screen map
Chain receive map + edit inputs, set next prog/map/errormsg for return handling
Set no info msg, chain read xref->acct->cust using acct ID, skip display if any NOTFND
Default abend msg if none, set culprit, SEND ABEND-DATA NOHANDLE, cancel HANDLE, ABEND 9999
Debug: SEND TEXT WS-RETURN-MSG ERASE/FREEKB, RETURN

error_handling.condition: CICS READ RESP-CD = NOTFND or OTHER
error_handling.action: Set INPUT-ERROR true, FLG-ACCTFILTER-NOT-OK true, build WS-RETURN-MSG via STRING with op/file/key/resp/resp2 (if msg-off), reprompt via 1000-SEND-MAP
Trap via HANDLE LABEL ABEND-ROUTINE: send ABEND-DATA, ABEND ABCODE 9999
Set ABEND-CODE 0001, WS-RETURN-MSG 'UNEXPECTED DATA SCENARIO', SEND-PLAIN-TEXT

cics_operations.purpose: Send account view map from CACTVWAO with CURSOR/ERASE/FREEKB/RESP
Read card xref by acct RIDFLD with RESP/RESP2 into CARD-XREF-RECORD
Read account master by acct RIDFLD with RESP/RESP2 into ACCOUNT-RECORD
Read customer master by cust RIDFLD with RESP/RESP2 into CUSTOMER-RECORD
PF3 exit to menu/caller with COMMAREA(CARDDEMO-COMMAREA)
Return to CAVW TRANSID with COMMAREA(WS-COMMAREA) full length

open_questions.question: Exact field layouts in copybooks (e.g., lengths/types of CDEMO-ACCT-ID=11-digit, ACCT-CURR-BAL)
open_questions.context: Assumed from usage (e.g., PIC 9(11) for acct ID from edits), but not explicitly defined in source
open_questions.suggestion: Analyze copybook source files like COCOM01Y, CVACT01Y

open_questions.question: Implementation of YYYY-STORE-PFKEY (PERFORM at 299)
open_questions.context: Invoked via PERFORM but defined in COPY 'CSSTRPFY' at 913 (not expanded)

open_questions.question: Purpose/usage of CVACT02Y (copied at 248)
open_questions.context: Copied but no visible usage in source
open_questions.suggestion: Check if used in unshown copybook expansions
